related_questions.question: Why is solar power better than renewable energy sources?
related_questions.snippet: While in use, solar panels create absolutely no waste or emissions. Unlike fossil fuel power plants, they produce clean, renewable energy from a fuel source that requires no locating, excavation, transportation, or combustion. It's a simpler, cheaper, cleaner, and all-around better energy solution.

answer_box.title: Renewable energy target (RET) & alternate energy sources
answer_box.snippet: Solar energy is a renewable free source of energy that is sustainable and totally inexhaustible, unlike fossil fuels that are finite. It is also a non-polluting source of energy and it does not emit any greenhouse gases when producing electricity. ... Using solar power means reducing your energy bills and saving money.
